title: Bún Riêu Cô Hương Béo Phan Xích Long
address: 87 Phan Xích Long, phường 2, Phú Nhuận, Hồ Chí Minh

most_relevant_reviews.name: Zelda Kris
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Co Huong Beo pork rieu vermicelli restaurant on Phan Xich Long street is a great choice for those who love this traditional dish. With a convenient location, spacious parking and enthusiastic staff, this is a place you should not miss.

One of the restaurant's strengths is its convenient location. Located on Phan Xich Long street, the restaurant is easily accessible and attracts many customers. You don't need to search too long to come here to enjoy delicious food.

Spacious and comfortable parking space is a great advantage of the restaurant. You can feel secure when coming here because you don't have to worry about finding parking. Shop staff also help you arrange your car neatly, creating a feeling of safety and convenience.

The food at Co Huong Beo pork rieu vermicelli restaurant is considered stable, no different from other restaurants in the chain. The food is prepared quickly, without having to wait long. This is especially convenient for people who have busy schedules or want to quickly enjoy lunch.

Prices at the restaurant are also considered reasonable and acceptable. You can order a rare dish and add a balut for only 45k, this is a quite reasonable price in the current restaurant market. You will not feel too financially pressured when coming to the shop.

Another notable point at the restaurant is that you can freely choose toppings according to your preferences with prices depending on the toppings. This allows you to customize your dish to suit your individual tastes, providing comfort and satisfaction.

In summary, Co Huong Beo pork rieu vermicelli restaurant on Phan Xich Long street is a place worth visiting. With a convenient location, spacious parking, stable food, affordable prices and flexibility in choosing toppings, the restaurant is worth exploring and enjoying attractive traditional dishes.

most_relevant_reviews.name: hồng nhung phan thị
most_relevant_reviews.review: The service staff is so bad, the restaurant is dirty, the spices on the table are all gone (chopped peppers are sour), the staff waits forever when they tell them to bring it out (all they worry about is dialing the phone), when they bring a bowl of vermicelli, they carry it with one hand and the other. press phone. Ordered 2 bowls of vermicelli and 1 glass of kumquat tea, but there was no glass of water to drink. There is no second time

most_relevant_reviews.name: Sang Nguyễn Thanh
most_relevant_reviews.review: Temporary food. I ordered the special full topping, the price of 65k is a bit high, but that's okay because the price is high in the phan chain long area. Shrimp paste is delicious, making it yourself will be even more delicious. The broth is sour and a bit salty, adding shrimp paste will make it more flavorful.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Duy Phương Nguyễn (AJ)
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Crispy pork rieu vermicelli is a famous dish that everyone from the North to the South knows.

This dish is associated with the age of students as well as the 7x and 8x generations...

The main restaurant is on Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, close to Mac Dinh Chi, District 1

And the newest branch is available at Phan Xich Long Food Street. Also in Le Van Sy District 3.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Gin Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review: When I finished eating, I discovered that there was a "hair" stem in the bowl (it didn't look like it, but I hoped so because I didn't expect it to be another stem). Then, after I finished paying, I called an employee over and reminded her with the intention of giving feedback, hoping to receive an apology from the restaurant. But to have this assessment, everyone knows how it happened.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Phuong Thao TRAN HUYNH
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Delicious vermicelli noodles, tofu and crispy pork rind. I just don't like that after eating, my neck feels a bit numb because of the MSG.
Occasionally, if I want a change of taste, I will stop by the shop.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Steven Văn
most_relevant_reviews.review: Normally I often eat here and its branches. On September 21, I ate at Phan Xich Long and had a stomach ache from afternoon to evening. So scared

most_relevant_reviews.name: long1 nguyên
most_relevant_reviews.review: Delicious and clean vermicelli noodles

Crispy pork rieu vermicelli is a famous dish that everyone from the North to the South knows.

This dish is associated with the age of students as well as the 7x and 8x generations...

The main restaurant is on Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, close to Mac Dinh Chi, District 1

And the newest branch is available at Phan Xich Long Food Street. Also in Le Van Sy District 3.

highest_rating_reviews.name: Phuong Thao TRAN HUYNH
highest_rating_reviews.review:
Delicious vermicelli noodles, tofu and crispy pork rind. I just don't like that after eating, my neck feels a bit numb because of the MSG.
Occasionally, if I want a change of taste, I will stop by the shop.

highest_rating_reviews.name: Sang Nguyễn Thanh
highest_rating_reviews.review: Temporary food. I ordered the special full topping, the price of 65k is a bit high, but that's okay because the price is high in the phan chain long area. Shrimp paste is delicious, making it yourself will be even more delicious. The broth is sour and a bit salty, adding shrimp paste will make it more flavorful.

highest_rating_reviews.name: Steven Văn
highest_rating_reviews.review: Normally I often eat here and its branches. On September 21, I ate at Phan Xich Long and had a stomach ache from afternoon to evening. So scared

highest_rating_reviews.name: hồng nhung phan thị
highest_rating_reviews.review: The service staff is so bad, the restaurant is dirty, the spices on the table are all gone (chopped peppers are sour), the staff waits forever when they tell them to bring it out (all they worry about is dialing the phone), when they bring a bowl of vermicelli, they carry it with one hand and the other. press phone. Ordered 2 bowls of vermicelli and 1 glass of kumquat tea, but there was no glass of water to drink. There is no second time

highest_rating_reviews.name: Gin Nguyen
highest_rating_reviews.review: When I finished eating, I discovered that there was a "hair" stem in the bowl (it didn't look like it, but I hoped so because I didn't expect it to be another stem). Then, after I finished paying, I called an employee over and reminded her with the intention of giving feedback, hoping to receive an apology from the restaurant. But to have this assessment, everyone knows how it happened.

most_relevant_reviews.review: The vermicelli with tofu and shrimp paste and vermicelli noodles here are very delicious and the price is affordable. She has been selling here for a long time, and has just moved to a brighter, more spacious location. There's also pennywort ginseng water.

most_relevant_reviews.name: nghi nguyễn
most_relevant_reviews.review: The delicious vermicelli noodle soup makes the whole family happy. The two ladies there are so cute and the ginseng and pennywort and soy sauce is so delicious, it's the best.

location: Phú Nhuận, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
keyword: bún riêu ở Phú Nhuận, TP. Hồ Chí Minh

title: Nhà Hàng Ngõ 8
address: 8 Cù Lao, Phường 2, Phú Nhuận, Hồ Chí Minh

most_relevant_reviews.name: Dang Loi
most_relevant_reviews.review: Cheap north Viet bites, affordable price, bike parking in the end of the alley but they have a transit car for it

most_relevant_reviews.name: TatyanKA G
most_relevant_reviews.review:
I often pass by this restaurant and it was always crowded.  And this is no coincidence, they cook quite tasty - not perfect, but above average.  The squid I ordered was perfect, here they are not afraid to serve a foreigner a spicy dish or fermented tofu sauce, it is very nice.
They have draft beer in iron bottles to diversify the drinks.
A little noisy, but the format of the institution suggests it.  We sat on the second floor and it was quite fresh there.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Tomorrow CU
most_relevant_reviews.review: Food is kind salty, not my type. Staffs here are in their path when serving, just be patient.

most_relevant_reviews.name: hoang nguyenthao
most_relevant_reviews.review: Crowded place with full of people at peak time. Recommended place for people who love Northern foods - they serve tasty junk foods but not hot pot. The floor is quite dirty but you don't actually pay attention to it since it's always fully booked. Parking area is 200m (at least) from the restaurant but they provide shuttle tuktuk (free of charge). Should try if you like Northern foods.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Tuan H. Vu (Tom)
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Best place for Northern food in HCMC
They even have golf car to take you from/to the parking lot
The parking is free

most_relevant_reviews.name: Le Phuoc Phuc
most_relevant_reviews.review: Location and decor is good, but food is terrible, only Pho Cuon is eatable, the rest is very low standard. Service is ok.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Saladin Golden
most_relevant_reviews.review:
Đồ ăn ngon, dịch vụ tốt, nhưng không gian hơi chật chút

Good food, staff are friendly, there is a shuttle vehicle transporting people from the parking place to the restaurant. The restaurant itself is kinda small, seats are small, tables are small, but not too uncomfortable. Recommended for anyone looking for a northern touch in the south.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Rosa Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review: Super crowded and a bit dirty, however the foods are nice and cheap.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Neo Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review: Good place to hangout with friendly .. pretty tasty dishes with reasonable price

most_relevant_reviews.name: cop con
most_relevant_reviews.review: Nice foods, but over crowded!!

most_relevant_reviews.name: Ken Nham
most_relevant_reviews.review: very noisy environment. plus parking at a distance away about 300 meters cost 3k vnd. which includes a transit by an electric cart from parking to restaurant.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Dũng Huy Trần
most_relevant_reviews.review: Wanna enjoy a wide range of some of the Northen Vietnamese dishes in center of Saigon? This is a nice place to come, best suit group of friends in informal occassions. Reservation is recommended as this small space gets crowded in every evening around 6 - 9 p.m (it's peaking hours).

most_relevant_reviews.name: Geoffrey Le
most_relevant_reviews.review: This small place has one great disadvantage - its limited space, but it seems people do enjoy a little squeezing while eating. They accept it as a positive feeling, like they are having a value meal as the crowd proves. Other than that, food is acceptable and expectable for a Northern style cuisine fused with Southern tasting. A signature beer from the North is being offered that really could simulate your surrounding to the crowded walking streets in Ha Noi.

most_relevant_reviews.name: Lola Nguyen
most_relevant_reviews.review: Small portions. Better if you go in group. The parking lot is quite far away so they have "tuk tuk" like verhicle to bring you to the restaurant which is pretty fun :D

newest_reviews.name: kanjiriko kojo
newest_reviews.review: The restaurant is delicious, there is always a place to sit. Having a tuk tuk to go is quite nice :).

newest_reviews.name: Nguyen Minh Tri
newest_reviews.review: Alley 8 Restaurant offers an impressive culinary experience with delicious and filling crab and beef rib cartilage hotpot. Rich hot pot broth, diverse and rich toppings (chai lua, fish cake, tofu, beef, rib cartilage,...), suitable for 4 people to eat comfortably. But you also need to order one more rice cake to be full. However, the Ha Long squid patties are a bit small and the taste is not outstanding or too special. The price in my opinion is quite high at 90k for about 8-9 pieces. The stuffed snail dish is okay, a combination of snails and meat, delicious but not too special. Banh day dipped in salty fish sauce has a strange flavor and is quite delicious. The total bill of 513k is reasonable for the meal, although there are some dishes that are not really outstanding. Well, this parking spot is quite far from the restaurant and there is a TukTuk to pick you up.

newest_reviews.name: Nhi Huynh
newest_reviews.review: The 210k hot pot was terrible. The broth felt foul, sour, and smelled like beer. I asked the staff and they said it was vinegar. If it was too sour, you would pour in filtered water and it would become nothing. The spring rolls also felt a bit sour as if they were about to spoil. I've really liked this restaurant for a long time. I like the chicken feet, squid teeth, etc., all very delicious, but this time I came back it was so bad.

newest_reviews.name: Trung Nguyen
newest_reviews.review: The snack shop has light snacks to drink beer, suitable for small groups, office workers - students

newest_reviews.name: J Marketing (Jasper)
newest_reviews.review: Pick up and drop off by tuktuk, normal food

newest_reviews.name: An An
newest_reviews.review: The shop sells many snacks with northern tastes and is very crowded.

newest_reviews.name: Trà Lê
newest_reviews.review:
This restaurant cooks according to northern tastes, so if you are someone who likes to eat a lot of greasy spices, this restaurant is not the perfect choice.
I'm from the North, so the dishes I recommend are for everyone to experience the basic Northern dishes: fish cakes, spring rolls, dumplings, squid rolls, water spinach with shrimp salad. If you don't feel full, order crab hotpot. beef shank (because the fish cake is eaten with vermicelli, if you add hot pot it seems full)
Regarding the taste, I find it quite oke, true to the spirit of northern dishes.
Ah, the parking lot is far away but there is a tram to pick you up so it's okay.
The restaurant should go at 6pm because it will be a bit crowded later.

newest_reviews.review:

newest_reviews.name: Dư Anh Nguyệt
newest_reviews.review: This afternoon, I went with my colleagues to try Quan Ngo 8 CN2 - VVT => Had some really bad experiences! Order a portion of pho rolls, squid teeth with garlic, sweet potato cocoon, crab meat hotpot, lemon tea, kumquat tea. Pho rolls are bad! It's all vegetables, the meat is shriveled in a few pieces but still smells like meat. The cocooned sweet potatoes are hard because they are covered with a thick dough shell. Squid teeth are edible. Lemon tea, kumquat tea are bad. The hot pot is okay, there are quite a lot of toppings. But it's really not delicious. But the most impressive thing is probably the PARKING FEE 🙂 When paying, the staff asked how many motorbikes. I said to take 3 cars, thinking the shop would give me a card for free parking BUT NO! INertia ALWAYS HAS TO RETAIN THE CAR IN THE BILL 5K/VEHICLE :)))) It's really hard to help! Eat once... NEVER GO BACK 😊 The restaurant has no parking space, forcing customers to walk a long way (Hoa Binh Tourism Company) to park their cars is already a big inconvenience for customers, and they also have to pay a deposit. Car collects bill. I'm speechless 😏 It's better to collect money right at the parking lot, it's less frustrating :)) It's so strange to do business!!! My friend's face stiffened after eating and her lips popped but she had no feeling. The restaurant's hotpot probably has a lot of MSG in it.

newest_reviews.name: moriyama teruaki
newest_reviews.review:
There were people sitting around the hot pot on the terrace, so I went in. I ate it without knowing much about it, but it tasted delicious. While using a translation app, I asked my brother how to make hotpot and ate it.
I ate the crab with the shell on, but the people around me threw away the shell. It's a cultural difference.

newest_reviews.review: Alley 8 Restaurant offers an impressive culinary experience with delicious and filling crab and beef rib cartilage hotpot. Rich hot pot broth, diverse and rich toppings (chai lua, fish cake, tofu, beef, rib cartilage,...), suitable for 4 people to eat comfortably. But you also need to order one more rice cake to be full. However, the Ha Long squid patties are a bit small and the taste is not outstanding or too special. The price in my opinion is quite high at 90k for about 8-9 pieces. The stuffed snail dish is okay, a combination of snails and meat, delicious but not too special. Banh day dipped in salty fish sauce has a strange flavor and is quite delicious. The total bill of 513k is reasonable for the meal, although there are some dishes that are not really outstanding. Well, this parking spot is quite far from the restaurant and there is a TukTuk to pick you up.

newest_reviews.name: Nhi Huynh
newest_reviews.review: The 210k hot pot was terrible. The broth felt foul, sour, and smelled like beer. I asked the staff and they said it was vinegar. If it was too sour, you would pour in filtered water and it would become nothing. The spring rolls also felt a bit sour as if they were about to spoil. I've really liked this restaurant for a long time. I like the chicken feet, squid teeth, etc., all very delicious, but this time I came back it was so bad.

newest_reviews.name: Trung Nguyen
newest_reviews.review: The snack shop has light snacks to drink beer, suitable for small groups, office workers - students

newest_reviews.name: J Marketing (Jasper)
newest_reviews.review: Pick up and drop off by tuktuk, normal food

newest_reviews.name: An An
newest_reviews.review: The shop sells many snacks with northern tastes and is very crowded.

newest_reviews.name: Trà Lê
newest_reviews.review:
This restaurant cooks according to northern tastes, so if you are someone who likes to eat a lot of greasy spices, this restaurant is not the perfect choice.
I'm from the North, so the dishes I recommend are for everyone to experience the basic Northern dishes: fish cakes, spring rolls, dumplings, squid rolls, water spinach with shrimp salad. If you don't feel full, order crab hotpot. beef shank (because the fish cake is eaten with vermicelli, if you add hot pot it seems full)
Regarding the taste, I find it quite oke, true to the spirit of northern dishes.
Ah, the parking lot is far away but there is a tram to pick you up so it's okay.
The restaurant should go at 6pm because it will be a bit crowded later.

newest_reviews.name: Nghia Luu
newest_reviews.review: Every dish you order is delicious. There's nothing to complain about. 10 points. Too suitable for drinking

newest_reviews.name: Giang Đinh
newest_reviews.review: Hanoi food. Delicious, but forgot to take pictures

newest_reviews.name: Vy Yyy
newest_reviews.review:
Experience electric cars in SG =))
The food is good but for me it's not special. Expected a lot from the surface dish but found it normal. Suitable for going out drinking with friends. There is a birthday party.
Cute cast of characters.
4 VND, total bill is 491k.

newest_reviews.name: Tâm Lê
newest_reviews.review: The restaurant is quite hot, the food is okay, the restaurant staff asked for money to park the car even though I parked myself and the restaurant had no one to guide me, 30k is not worth much but it can easily cause loss of sympathy, I will never visit a second time.

newest_reviews.name: Ha Duc Thuan
newest_reviews.review: Everyone be on alert and report that the car has been tampered with on a stretcher!!!

newest_reviews.name: Nguyễn Thị Thuy Hang
newest_reviews.review:
The tuktuk driver drove recklessly twice, crossing puddles of water splashing on me and passersby with a defiant attitude, this is my shop's.
Never come back

newest_reviews.name: Như Nguyễn Quỳnh
newest_reviews.review:
I've eaten many times but now I've only eaten vermicelli with tofu and shrimp paste. The shrimp paste is not good. In general, people should avoid this dish.
We ate old dishes: chicken feet, squid, squid teeth, snails, quail eggs,

newest_reviews.name: Dư Anh Nguyệt
newest_reviews.review: This afternoon, I went with my colleagues to try Quan Ngo 8 CN2 - VVT => Had some really bad experiences! Order a portion of pho rolls, squid teeth with garlic, sweet potato cocoon, crab meat hotpot, lemon tea, kumquat tea. Pho rolls are bad! It's all vegetables, the meat is shriveled in a few pieces but still smells like meat. The cocooned sweet potatoes are hard because they are covered with a thick dough shell. Squid teeth are edible. Lemon tea, kumquat tea are bad. The hot pot is okay, there are quite a lot of toppings. But it's really not delicious. But the most impressive thing is probably the PARKING FEE 🙂 When paying, the staff asked how many motorbikes. I said to take 3 cars, thinking the shop would give me a card for free parking BUT NO! INertia ALWAYS HAS TO RETAIN THE CAR IN THE BILL 5K/VEHICLE :)))) It's really hard to help! Eat once... NEVER GO BACK 😊 The restaurant has no parking space, forcing customers to walk a long way (Hoa Binh Tourism Company) to park their cars is already a big inconvenience for customers, and they also have to pay a deposit. Car collects bill. I'm speechless 😏 It's better to collect money right at the parking lot, it's less frustrating :)) It's so strange to do business!!! My friend's face stiffened after eating and her lips popped but she had no feeling. The restaurant's hotpot probably has a lot of MSG in it.

newest_reviews.name: moriyama teruaki
newest_reviews.review:
There were people sitting around the hot pot on the terrace, so I went in. I ate it without knowing much about it, but it tasted delicious. While using a translation app, I asked my brother how to make hotpot and ate it.
I ate the crab with the shell on, but the people around me threw away the shell. It's a cultural difference.

newest_reviews.name: Tuấn Thanh
newest_reviews.review: Fine

newest_reviews.name: 24_0005 Lê Thanh Duy
newest_reviews.review: The staff is heartless and soulless. Reminded 7 7 49 times but still haven't brought hot pot. My heart hurts like I'm hungry, but I keep repeating it hundreds of times. No need to eat green beans anymore. Bye bye

newest_reviews.name: Harper Nguyen
newest_reviews.review:
The restaurant specializes in Hanoi style street snacks with prices ranging from 45~70k & also has draft beer.

The restaurant's delicious signature dishes that you should try are: fried salted chicken feet, fried milk squid with tamarind sauce, water spinach salad, tofu noodles with shrimp paste & crab hotpot.

It's a bit slow when it's crowded. The parking lot is far from the restaurant, but the special thing about this place is that there are tuktuks to pick up customers.

I thought this place would serve very late, but the kitchen closes around 10:15 p.m. So I made myself a pretty bad cup of dracontomelon.

The total damage for 2 drunk people ranged from 500K

newest_reviews.name: Dang Loi
newest_reviews.review: Cheap north Viet bites, affordable price, bike parking in the end of the alley but they have a transit car for it

newest_reviews.name: AquaGarden
newest_reviews.review: Delicious snack shop

highest_rating_reviews.name: TatyanKA G
highest_rating_reviews.review:
I often pass by this restaurant and it was always crowded.  And this is no coincidence, they cook quite tasty - not perfect, but above average.  The squid I ordered was perfect, here they are not afraid to serve a foreigner a spicy dish or fermented tofu sauce, it is very nice.
They have draft beer in iron bottles to diversify the drinks.
A little noisy, but the format of the institution suggests it.  We sat on the second floor and it was quite fresh there.

highest_rating_reviews.name: Tuan H. Vu (Tom)
highest_rating_reviews.review:
Best place for Northern food in HCMC
They even have golf car to take you from/to the parking lot
The parking is free

highest_rating_reviews.name: Saladin Golden
highest_rating_reviews.review:
Đồ ăn ngon, dịch vụ tốt, nhưng không gian hơi chật chút

Good food, staff are friendly, there is a shuttle vehicle transporting people from the parking place to the restaurant. The restaurant itself is kinda small, seats are small, tables are small, but not too uncomfortable. Recommended for anyone looking for a northern touch in the south.

highest_rating_reviews.name: Thuyanh Vu
highest_rating_reviews.review: Great price and awesome tapas dishes! Can't believe you can find great Northern streetfood in Sài Gòn

highest_rating_reviews.review: Delicous dishes and hot pot. Suitable for any kind of groups but you should come early during weekend to reserve tables.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Ơi, My đây!
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
A bad experience for the first time visiting the restaurant:
- After I ordered apricot wine, the beer marketer came over and asked for more beer. When I refused, he said he was out of apricot wine. When I ordered beer to drink, he said he already had apricot wine. Because of the bottles of beer, I don't like to trick customers like that.
- asked the customer how many motorbikes he was riding, it turned out to include the parking fee in the bill
- I ate crab and beef rib cartilage hotpot. When I got home, I had a stomach ache and diarrhea that hasn't gone away since last night. Maybe the ingredients weren't right.

Please leave it alone

lowest_rating_reviews.review: While eating and drinking at 11:00 p.m., the staff was playing cards and screaming as if to chase customers away even though the restaurant was open until 2:00 a.m.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Ha Duc Thuan
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Everyone be on alert and report that the car has been tampered with on a stretcher!!!

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Le Duc Tam
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
Dishes are priced higher than the regional average, but edible.
1 star service:
- If you want to attract more guests, arrange the table like sardines, sit and talk to the person opposite you - the next table can hear you better.
- Because of stacking sardines, I often bumped into the customer's chair while walking, culminating in almost splashing a bowl of boiling hot pot water on the customer, but did not apologize, but blamed the chair and the customer (the chair and the main table arranged by themselves). . And such a joking, lackadaisical attitude seems to be the cultural feature of this shop.

It's been 2 years since I had to rate a restaurant 1 star. Too bad.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: THẢO TRẦN
lowest_rating_reviews.review: The last time my friend and I went to eat, the place was dirty, and when we came home we still had a stomach ache, so we won't go back

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Van Vo
lowest_rating_reviews.review: The food is okay. But the face of the female waitress wearing glasses looked unhappy and very uncomfortable. I don't know if it's like that every day. Yesterday she "completely threw" a lump of alcohol into the hot pot stove that was on fire.!! Very dangerous.! When the guy in my team asked, "Do you charge a fee to park your car?", the white male friend, wearing a floral short-sleeved shirt, replied, "Oh my god, why don't you charge me a fee to park your car?" charge." - Speak in a very disrespectful way to customers! Probably the last time eating here.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Vincent Huynh
lowest_rating_reviews.review:
Bad experience when going to the restaurant
I asked the staff to chill the beer but received a BAD attitude from the staff member in a gray shirt and short jeans.

too disappointed

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Long Tran
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Knowing about the restaurant from tiktok and some websites, I won't experience it a second time. It's always very crowded in the evenings, especially on weekends. The seating area is not comfortable. If you want to eat, you have to wait quite a long time. Second, the food is nothing special. My table of 4 people ordered chicken feet, fried squid with fish sauce, squid rolls, fish balls, hot pot, and some other miscellaneous dishes, according to everyone's reviews. In the group, except for the squid rolls, it was ok, the rest were just average. Especially, many people said that the hotpot was very delicious, but the experience was nothing but one word "BAD", to summarize: the food was not as good as said. The station of the rw saints went online, the space was cramped and frustrating because the shop was very crowded. And after the whole group finished eating, that night and the next morning everyone let off fireworks loudly. At first, they thought it was just them because they were afraid of having a weak stomach, but the whole group was being treated (maybe the whole group had a weak stomach@@). ). The only plus point of the restaurant is that the food comes out quickly... everything else, if you want to come and experience it, just come and have your own feeling!

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Duyet Nguyen
lowest_rating_reviews.review: In my group of 9 people, we ate about 20 portions (because each portion was very small). First of all, I admit that the restaurant's food is okay, not bad and not expensive. But I give this shop 1 star because: the group drank 16 bottles of brown tiger, inertia 18 bottles, 4 other people came in after an hour of drinking 14 bottles of silver tiger, calculated as 18 bottles (while 1 bottle in the shop costs 20k). Next, 9 people use 9 cold towels, which is 22. Where did 9 people bring out 22 cold towels? When it was time to leave to get the car, I couldn't calm down. I gave the ticket to the security guys and they asked me where my car was. I told them earlier that they said I should put the guard on the sidewalk and then they led me here. How did I know? He asked for the license plate number of the car and so I had to go find it myself, but they just stood there. Once you go to this restaurant, you will never return.

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Bảo Trần
lowest_rating_reviews.review: The service staff is so bad, so is the driver who takes customers to pick up their cars. The food is nothing special. The staff glared so they were not in the mood to eat

lowest_rating_reviews.name: Loop Ch
lowest_rating_reviews.review: Small shop, sitting inside like a furnace, ordering takes a long time. If you go with your family, you will definitely have to wait. lowest_rating_reviews.name: Dư Anh Nguyệt
lowest_rating_reviews.review: This afternoon, I went with my colleagues to try Quan Ngo 8 CN2 - VVT => Had some really bad experiences! INertia ALWAYS HAS TO RETAIN THE CAR IN THE BILL 5K/VEHICLE :)))) It's really hard to help! Eat once... NEVER GO BACK 😊 The restaurant has no parking space, forcing customers to walk a long way (Hoa Binh Tourism Company) to park their cars is already a big inconvenience for customers, and they also have to pay a deposit.
